titles.title: One Day Closer To The Kingdom

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
One day closer to the kingdom.
That makes every day a little better than the day before.
I can take another step, knowing that tomorrow,
I'll be one day closer to the shore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sometimes I think I just can't take another step.
The storms of life keep raging o'er and o'er.
But something down in my heart,
makes me want to keep on walking.
I'll be one step closer to the shore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's something in me that can't go back again.
There's something in me that can't go back again.
Well Satan can tempt, and Satan can test,
And every day he will do his best,
But there's something in me that can't go back again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's something in me that's got to keep moving on.
There's something in me that's got to keep moving on.
The King of Kings, who reigns in me,
Is singing songs of victory,
And there's something in me that's got to keep moving on.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Un paso más cerca al reino
Y cada día es un poco más lleno de paz,
Este día puedo andar
Sabiendo que mañana
Estaré cerca del reino un paso más

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
A veces pienso, ya no puedo andar
Y quiero pararme y descansar
Más algo muy adentro me hace seguir andando
Y estaré cerca al Reino un paso más.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
/Hay algo en mí que no puede volver atrás/ (2)
Satanás me puede tentar, me puede probar
Y cada día me puede hablar
Mas hay algo en mí que no puede volver atrás

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
/Hay algo en mí que adelante va a seguir/ (2)
El Rey de reyes que reina ya
Y en cada batalla cantará
Más hay algo en mí que adelante va a seguir
